paper_abstract: A new construction of optical orthogonal codes is provided in this correspondence which is a generalization of the well-known construction of distinct difference set (DDS) by Bose and Chowla. This construction is optimal with respect to the Johnson bound and has parameters n = q(a) - 1, omega = q, and lambda = 1.
paper_title: A generalized Bose-Chowla family of optical orthogonal codes and distinct difference sets
